EmailTemplate.name: Contract Review Submission Template
EmailTemplate.subject: {!Contract_Review__c.Assigned_AE_Name__c} has requested review for {!Contract_Review__c.Customer_Account_Name__c} agreement
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
{!Contract_Review__c.Assigned_AE__r.Name} has just submitted a new contract review for {!Contract_Review__c.Customer_Account__r.Name}. The SLA for {!Contract_Review__c.OwnerFullName} is 10 business days starting now.
The submitter has filled out these answers to the required intake questions: If the agreement includes Infosec and/or Integration considerations, Kyle Tobener and/or Rob Canfield may need to be additional approvers. Thank you for helping to contain all communications about this agreement within Chatter regarding this case.
